entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
